faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the main questions about our services

questions.question: What services does Align offer?
questions.answer: Align offers a complete range of services including Development, Customer Support, Video Editing, Marketing, Project Management, Admin, Accounting, and Design. Each service is customized to meet the specific needs of the client.

questions.question: How do you ensure service quality?
questions.answer: We maintain rigorous quality control processes, including constant monitoring, regular feedback, and continuous team training. We also use specific metrics and KPIs for each service.

questions.question: Can I hire just one specific service?
questions.answer: Yes, our services can be contracted individually or together, depending on your needs. We offer flexibility to adapt our services to your business model.

questions.question: How does the pricing model work?
questions.answer: We work with a transparent pricing model based on services used and demand volume. We offer flexible plans that can be adjusted according to your needs.

questions.question: Is there a minimum contract period?
questions.answer: We offer different contract modalities to meet each client's needs. Contact us to discuss the best option for your company.

questions.question: What payment methods are accepted?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods, including credit card, bank transfer, and wire transfer. Payments are processed monthly based on services used.

questions.question: How does support work?
questions.answer: We offer 24/7 support through multiple channels (chat, email, phone). Our team is always available to help with any questions or needs.

questions.question: What's the average response time?
questions.answer: Our average first response time is 4 hours, with most cases resolved within 24 hours. Critical cases have priority and immediate attention.

questions.question: Is support offered in other languages?
questions.answer: Yes, our team is multilingual and can provide support in various languages, including Portuguese, English, and Spanish.

questions.question: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: We use the most modern and secure technologies in the market, always updated with the latest trends. Our stack includes enterprise-grade tools to ensure the best performance.

questions.question: How do you ensure data security?
questions.answer: We follow strict security protocols, including end-to-end encryption, regular backups, and compliance with GDPR and other data protection regulations.

questions.question: Is it possible to integrate with other systems?
questions.answer: Yes, our solutions are developed with interoperability in mind. We offer APIs and integrations with major market systems.
